description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. You are an Unborn, created to benefit those who created you. You are summoned to destroy your master's enemies however the path to being summoned is not an easy one. You must survive the onslaught of enemies known as the Unknowns to reach the point of your creation. They will stop at nothing to stop you and you will stop at nothing to succeed.
description.short: You are an Unborn, created to benefit those who created you. You are summoned to destroy your master's enemies however the path to being summoned is not an easy one. You must survive the onslaught of enemies known as the Unknowns to reach the point of your creation. They will stop at nothing to stop you and you will stop at nothing to succeed.
